thread.section_title: Flugladen.de Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Flugladen.de | www.flugladen.de
thread.title: Sarah B. H
thread.title_full: Flugladen.de bewertet von Sarah B. H

author: Sarah B. H
title: Sarah B. H
text: Very good website. Although in German language, it worked perfectly by using the translating service on Chrome, so no problems faced. I booked a ticket with Flugladen three times (istanbul to Karachi; Karachi to Billund; and Hamburg to Karachi) and every time I got the best price of tickets. Only one time the ticket confirmation came a bit late and as soon as I wrote to the website, they resolved my problem immediately. I highly recommend this website!
